author: Guerrilla Miniature Games
description:
We're back with The Indie Hour Episode Twenty-Eight! This series focuses on games you may have never even heard of and gives us an inside look at the wider world of independantly published Tabletop Wargames of all genres.

When something gets lost in the Galaxy; how do you get it back? You send a notice to the GRL (Galactic Reclamation League) and they put out an APB to registered and rogue Wreckers alike to get it back! Think Garbage-Men meet Bounty Hunters in this dark sci-fi Skirmish game in a decaying galaxy. Let's check it out!

Check out the this FREE Beta HERE: https://www.spacewreckers.com/
title: The GMG Indie Hour Ep 028 - SPACE WRECKERS  by Hector Klegg
